I think I've fixed the second exception recently. The first one is a duplicate of another bug you've reported. Please create a new report for each exception you find, which hopefully should be none :).

I'm going to mark this one fixed since I think that I've fixed the second exception. The first exception is the same as the exception you found in Open Declaration since it uses the same code path in the parser.
